name: ReCharge XR
summary:
CALM + FLEX + ENERGIZE

Experience the benefits of body-mind exercises with your 1-on-1 mindfulness coach within your home comfort. With ReCharge XR, you get your Yoga instructor, Qigong teacher, healthy-aging coach: and more!

Reduce stress and unwind after a long day at work, improve your posture, get more energy, prepare for a good night sleep, and reduce stiff limbs.

🧘 36+ MINDFULNESS EXPERIENCES
Recharge your mind and body with 36 specially designed programs! Target specific goals with categories...
